title: Win Tickets and a VIP Experience at San Francisco's Open-Air 2025 IllUM Block Party

html:
Alan Walker, Audien, BONNIE X CLYDE and more will throw down at The Midway for the return of the beloved IllUM Block Party.

c/o The Midway

Alan Walker, Audien, BONNIE X CLYDE and more will throw down at The Midway for the return of the beloved IllUM Block Party.

  • Home
  • EVENTS

In a city known for innovating everything from sourdough to smartphones, San Francisco's IllUM Block Party is once again poised to disrupt the city's Independence Day celebrations with its return to The Midway on July 5th.

The event, whose name cleverly abbreviates "Illuminate," promises to deliver what many in the Bay Area crave as much as a rent-controlled apartment: a night of euphoric beats and trippy art experiences. Headliner Alan Walker will bring his signature sound to The Midway for a massive headline performance, topping a lineup that also features electronic music stars Audien and BONNIE X CLYDE.

Beyond the beats, IllUM transforms The Midway into an interactive wonderland that would make even jaded tech workers look up from their screens. The festival's light installations and "unexpected moments of magic" offer an alternative to the traditional fireworks displays frequently obscured by Karl the Fog.

In a metropolis where connections are often mediated through apps, IllUM offers something increasingly rare in SF: authentic human connection through shared experience. As the event's organizers put it, you'll "step into the light, and emerge brighter."

Scroll to Continue

Recommended Articles

EDM.com has now joined forces with the organizers of IllUM Block Party for a special VIP ticket giveaway ahead of this year's event. We're giving away an exclusive VVIP experience, the winners of which will receive access to The Midway's new roof deck with a bird's eye view of the main stage, access to the VIP lounge, expedited entry and more.

Read on to discover how to enter. General tickets to IllUM Block Party 2025 will go on sale Thursday, March 6th at 10am PT, but fans can text "GLOW" to (415) 301-4355 for access to a pre-sale, which begins the day prior at the same time.

  • 2x pairs of VIP passes

To enter the giveaway, follow @themidwaysf and @edm on Instagram, and tag at least one friend in a comment on the post below (1 entry per comment, unlimited entries allowed)⁠. Then share the post in an Instagram Story and tag both accounts.

Follow The Midway SF:

Instagram: instagram.com/themidwaysf
X: x.com/themidwaysf
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@themidwaysf
Facebook: facebook.com/themidwaysf
